trans-unit.source: Add Push Notifications to App (iOS) | JavaScript Backend
trans-unit.target: Add Push Notifications to App (iOS) | JavaScript Backend

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Azure Mobile Services to send push notifications to your iOS app.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Azure Mobile Services to send push notifications to your iOS app.

trans-unit.source: Add Push Notifications to iOS App and JavaScript Backend
trans-unit.target: Add Push Notifications to iOS App and JavaScript Backend

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to add push notifications to the [quickstart project](mobile-services-ios-get-started.md), so that your mobile service sends a push notification each time a record is inserted.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to add push notifications to the [quickstart project](mobile-services-ios-get-started.md), so that your mobile service sends a push notification each time a record is inserted.

trans-unit.source: You must complete [Get Started with Mobile Services] first.
trans-unit.target: You must complete [Get Started with Mobile Services] first.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The [iOS simulator does not support push notifications](https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/IDEs/Conceptual/iOS_Simulator_Guide/TestingontheiOSSimulator.html), so you must use a physical iOS device.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The [iOS simulator does not support push notifications](https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/IDEs/Conceptual/iOS_Simulator_Guide/TestingontheiOSSimulator.html), so you must use a physical iOS device.

trans-unit.source: You'll also need to sign up for a paid [Apple Developer Program membership](https://developer.apple.com/programs/ios/).
trans-unit.target: You'll also need to sign up for a paid [Apple Developer Program membership](https://developer.apple.com/programs/ios/).

trans-unit.source: Configure Azure to Send Push Notifications
trans-unit.target: Configure Azure to Send Push Notifications

trans-unit.source: Update Backend Script to Send Push Notifications
trans-unit.target: Update Backend Script to Send Push Notifications

trans-unit.source: In the [Azure classic portal], click the **Data** tab and then click **TodoItem**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure classic portal], click the **Data** tab and then click **TodoItem**.

trans-unit.source: In **TodoItem**, click the **Script** tab and select **Insert**.
trans-unit.target: In **TodoItem**, click the **Script** tab and select **Insert**.

trans-unit.source: This displays the function that is invoked when an insert occurs in the **TodoItem** table.
trans-unit.target: This displays the function that is invoked when an insert occurs in the **TodoItem** table.

trans-unit.source: Replace the insert function with the following code, and then click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Replace the insert function with the following code, and then click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: This registers a new insert script, which uses the [apns object] to send a push notification (the inserted text) to the device provided in the insert request.
trans-unit.target: This registers a new insert script, which uses the [apns object] to send a push notification (the inserted text) to the device provided in the insert request.

trans-unit.source: This script delays sending the notification to give you time to close the app to receive a push notification.
trans-unit.target: This script delays sending the notification to give you time to close the app to receive a push notification.
